_sText: performance of hdr
Slightly reminds me of pong...in a fiery death sorta way.

It's been a while since I uploaded a map. So here I give you he_platformwar.

It's a knife/HE grenade map, with the special effect called cell shade, that give the map that cartoonish look.

Authors:
WaterWar = Making the map
Lost = Advice on the cell shade

Enjoy :)

This map was made by me, KitKat.
Idea by jasuslike (Aka ice1133)
UPDATE : 
-Added lightning
-Added knives (-> Nade's only were sometimes giving bugs that you cant throw them anymore.)
Have fun !

Small Close Combat Nade/Pistol Map

No Buy Zones, Good for perfecting nade throwing with wall angles

G|P - Nitehawk

Was playing he_tennis, and I thought that the map was too small so I wanted to create my own grenade map. This is what I came up with. I realize the lighting isn't perfect, it doesn't affect your game play any so I'm not too worried about it.

You can boost over the center wall which was my intention.

There is an awp on the roof of both buildings. You can not triple stack to get on the roof, however you can throw a grenade up there to get it down.

My first HE map. Your trapped on a lonely island in the carabians. Survive by throwing nades or die!

Made for x264 High Defenition Gaming. Visit us on www.x264-gaming.de

Regards, FastSwitch
Enjoy!
Hey

Map by Darkvin [FR]

Haruno_Darkvin@hotmail.fr

For people who like crazy gaming with explosive potatos flyin arround! Players spawn with a grenade, then they just need to go on the squares and will get another one or just rush like an idiot with a knife :ยบ This map also has a Eater Egg that can be found really easly, for people who like extreme speeeed! if you discover it, you can share it right here if you want to =) H A V E - F U N

Map and screenshots included in .Zip

I take no credit for this map my friend who goes by the name "Turkey" did please dont be tough on him though its only his second map. Anyway enjoy.

With that Please post comments on how map could be improved etc. Thanks

This map is packed with explosive oildrums and HE gernades. Throw gernades across the wall to kill or crawl through the new vent and pipe room to the other side to sneak-kill your enemy. Enjoy your battle!

AUTHORS:
akMan - Map creator
2tow- the origonal remix creator
Lots of nades to make a living hell...

Enjoy this map.

vending machine by Havok

I made this map because i was bored and have been thinking about the idea for a while...

- you have to nade through the gaps
- cannot shoot through middle glass
- plenty of grenades on floor and in little storage holder thing

hope you enjoy .. please comment and rate

thanks ^^

TITLE: CSS Map - he_nadebattle_v1
VERSION: 1
AUTHOR: akMan
E-MAIL: cs_akman@yahoo.com 
WEBSITE: http://www.freewebtown.com/cs_akman/csshome.htm

FILENAME: he_nadebattle.bsp 
FILESIZE: 390 kb 
DATE RELEASED: April 14th, 2007

CREDITS: akMan - Map Creator 

INSTALLATION: Extract all files to Steam\SteamApps\STEAM_USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\

DESCRIPTION: A fun, small map with HE gernades all over the floor. Throw the nades over the wall in the middle to kill. Use the boxes and the small platform to help you.
60 Spawnpoints (recommended 20 players max.)
You spawn with 1 HE and 1 knife.
This is the first version. There may be places that needs improvement. You can send suggestions/comments to cs_akman@yahoo.com.

COMMENTS: 60 Players in this map will be too much. About 20 would be nice.

TITLE: CSS Map - he_nadebattle_re_v2
VERSION: 3
AUTHOR: 2tow, akMan
E-MAIL: cs_akman@yahoo.com 
WEBSITE: http://www.freewebtown.com/cs_akman/csshome.htm

FILENAME: he_nadebattle_re_v2.bsp 
FILESIZE: 487 kb 
DATE RELEASED: April 29nd, 2007

CREDITS: 2tow - remix creator
	 akMan - remix editor/original map creator 

INSTALLATION: Extract all files to Steam\SteamApps\STEAM_USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

DESCRIPTION: A fun, small map with HE gernades all over the floor. Throw the nades over the wall to kill. Use the small platform to help you.
You spawn with 1 knife.
You can send suggestions/comments to cs_akman@yahoo.com.

Have fun.

TITLE: CSS Map - he_nadebattle_remixed
VERSION: 2
AUTHOR: 2tow, akMan
E-MAIL: cs_akman@yahoo.com 
WEBSITE: http://www.freewebtown.com/cs_akman/csshome.htm

FILENAME: he_nadebattle.bsp 
FILESIZE: 119 kb 
DATE RELEASED: April 22nd, 2007

CREDITS: 2tow - remix creator
	 akMan - original map creator 

INSTALLATION: Extract all files to Steam\SteamApps\STEAM_USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\

DESCRIPTION: A fun, small map with HE gernades all over the floor. Throw the nades over the wall to kill. Use the small platform to help you.
You spawn with 1 HE and 1 knife.
You can send suggestions/comments to cs_akman@yahoo.com.

Have fun.

Hi everybody,

This is my 3rd map only for nades with an excelent system for respawning nades.

**********************************************

When the map start all players spawn in a small corridor, when the player leaves his position a nade spawner is parenting to him and then all nades will spawn where the player is .... and its unlimited :D

Theres 2 spawn areas for the teams, with 32 spawnpoints per area.

This map is like surf_XIV, there is 8 different maps its not just one player who chooses the next map, it's ALL players who can choose by a vote.
8 vote zone for 8 maps (all the white block on the floor are a vote zone and there is a decals on each), 8 animated texture to see for which map they vote for and there's a description for 3 maps The 30th Sphere, Reload The Cannons and It's Nade O'Clock (in English and French).

**********************************************

The 8 maps are :

- Nade Arena (Teleporters A): 3 buildings (1 for each team and 1 in the middle) 3 floors per building. Find and kill all enemies or you can hide behind the walls to take players by surprise.
Kill the enemies with nades. The last team alive wins.
+ > Big arena, players can hide.
- > Nade spawner can be bugged, depends on your location, no nade will
spawn

- Cylinders (Teleporters A): 4 Cylinders, 2 per team. Its like a fan map but with nades only and multiple cylinders to play on. If a player is stuck down
more than 30seconds it active a system for unstuck him and the other who are stuck too, you need to go in the water for it help you. You have to fight each other. The last team alive win.
+ > Can go to the other cylinders, can stand on the walls who separate the
cylinders.
- > Fall damage not disabled, can take time, can lose height.

- The 30th Sphere (Teleporters B): Spheres falling from the sky. First the spheres spawn every 3 seconds, 30 seconds later the respawn delay changes and substract 0.5sec to the respawn timer, use your nades for destroying them before they touch the floor. If a sphere falls on the floor it substract 1 to a counter. The 30th sphere that falls on the ground will be fatal.
+ > Respawn delay change every 30 seconds, a counter show you how many
sphere can fall on the floor before CT or T die.
- > None

- Break The Targets (Teleporters B): 8 targets per team respawn when the target is broken (with a small animation) All targets spawn 5 times each and they can be broken with 2 nades. If you break a target, it moves a spike of the opposite team, the first team that breaks all the targets wins.
+ > Targets can be broken with 2 nades, targets look very nice :D
- > Can take time when there is not much player.

- Target In The Sky (Teleporters C): Choose a platform to stand on. A target can spawn everywhere, find it and destroy it. One nade can break it.
When a target spawns you have 5 seconds to break it, else it moves to an other location... find where! If you break one target it destroys 2 platforms of the opposite team. If you fall down from the platform u die!
+ > Only 1 nade can break the target.
- > None

- Nade The Hole (Teleporters C): 10 holes with a red block inside each one, aim well and the block can be broken with only 1 nade. The first team who breaks all the red blocks win.
+ > Different.
- > None

- Reload The Cannons (Teleporters D): 2 players per team can take control of a cannon. The rest of the team must use their nades to break the blocks on the trees, 1 block broken means that it adds 2 cannon balls for each cannon of their team (blue add 4 and gold blocks add 8 cannon balls). The players who have the control of the cannons must kill the players of the opposite team (1 team on each side). When all players of a team are dead the map kills the 2 other players of their team. The gunners cant shoot if their cannon are empty and only 50 cannon balls can be loaded.
+ > Beautiful map, nice cannon animation, excelent system for having only
2 players in the cannon location.
- > Only 2 cannons per team, sry :p

- It's Nade O'Clock (Teleporters D): 1 Needle per team hurt player but they dont kill in 1 hit. Players have choice : they can accelerate the rotations speed, they can change the height or they can the add damage to the needle of the opposite team, but they can reduce the rotations speed or they can reduce the damage gave by their needle. Use nade for breaking the blocks (red for t, blue for ct).
+ > A small green arrow apear to show which block have been broken first,
fun team work.
- > None

All the 8 maps have a protection to wait for all the players.

**********************************************

The map uses an excelent system for counting the votes, but it takes time :

* After spawning (after a player fall on water), all players have 15 seconds for voting for the map they want, after they have voted all players are frozen
and then the map counts the votes ...

* 5~ seconds later all players are unfreeze (at step 2/8) but counting is not finished yet...

* 30~ seconds later map vote ends and all players have 20 seconds to use the teleporters (only 2 per team and per mini map)
locate the doors with the lights on or follow the arrow with the teleporter's name (A, B, C or D).

* Finally after one minute and 10 seconds everybody can have fun (I hope :))

>>I have a server (for testing maps) pm me if you want more explainations ingame<<

**********************************************

This map need server with the NoBlock plugin.

Additional server settings :
- mp_limitteams 1 (for game balanced)
- mp_freezetime 0 (for going to vote immediatly)
- mp_roundtime 5 (having more than 3 min for playing)

**********************************************

Unfixable known bugs : nade spawner can be bugged, see the animated texture in the map for explanation!
Edit: Fixed on the "ultimate" version of he_nade4fun.

6 of the 8 maps have a knife but its only to prevent the nade spawner glitch.

**********************************************

A BIG thanks to Pimp Juice for helping me (translation, correcting sentences, finding bugs and testing all mini maps).
That map can be decompiled ... for learn. Respect my work, thanx.

>>If you like the map, please rate it!<<

>>NeMeSis[FR]<<

**********************************************

Updates:

>> he_nade4fun << (outdated)
- None.

>> he_nade4fun_final << (outdated)
- Added knife on some maps to prevent the nade spawner glitch.
- Added a message which randomly appear to ask players to read the screen for bug explanation
- Added point_viewcontrol to change the first view when a player join the server.

>> he_nade4fun_ultimate << (outdated)
- Debug zone added on all maps except "Cylinders" and "Target in The Sky", now the bug of the nade spawner can be fixed! (ingame only)
- Nade dropped by a dead player will be removed immidiately.
- Map name added in front of each vote zone.
- For the maps "Nade Arena" and "Cylinders", a knife spawn 3min after the protection desapear.
- In the map "Reload the cannons" a message apear on the hud panel with the following message :
>>Get out if you lost hp! / Sortez si vous perdez de la sante!<<
- Added random direction change of the needle for the map "It's Nade O'Clock".
- Map "Break The Targets" changed : now there is 2 floors (1 per teleporter).

>> he_nade4fun_platinum << (outdated)
- Map starter system changed.
- Teleporters lights are now green.
- Anti AFK does not kill immediatly, but hurts with 2 damage per second and display a message in the hud panel :
>> It's time to use the teleporters! Check which teleporters A, B, C or D with the green lights on. <<
in English and French.
NADE ARENA AND CYLINDERS
- Knife spawn delay changed to 2 minutes (3 minutes before).
CYLINDERS
- Water height changed.
TARGET IN THE SKY
- White light removed when players fall in the fog.
RELOAD THE CANNONS
- 2 players are now choosed by the map 45 and 55 min after the map is voted.
- The control rooms doors opens automatically 45 seconds after the map is voted.
- A message is displayed on the hud of the players that are allowed to take the control of a cannon.
- Cannons speed increased.
- Hud glass changed (clearlier).
- Glitch that players can go on the top of cannons fixed.
- Cannon balls damage and radius damage increased.
- 3 min after the map is voted : the cannons control rooms not hurt more and the doors to go to the other area are oppening.
- Gold blocks can be break with the knife (Only).
- Doors to go to the control cannon room never close.
NADE O'CLOCK
- Speed x2 for the block that control the arrow's speed.
- Chat message displaying when an arrow settings is max.
- Random reverse delay decreased.
- Respawn delay for the blocks decreased to 1 second (3 seconds before).
- Arrows stop rotating when a team won the game.

>> he_nade4fun_xenon << (comming soon...)

- Anti AFK does not kill immediatly, but hurts with 2 damage per second and display a message in the hud panel :
>> It's time to use the teleporters! Check which teleporters A, B, C or D with the green lights on. <<
in English and French.
NADE ARENA AND CYLINDERS
- Knife spawn delay changed to 2 minutes (3 minutes before).
CYLINDERS
- Water height changed.
TARGET IN THE SKY
- White light removed when players fall in the fog.
RELOAD THE CANNONS
- 2 players are now choosed by the map 45 and 55 min after the map is voted.
- The control rooms doors opens automatically 45 seconds after the map is voted.
- A message is displayed on the hud of the players that are allowed to take the control of a cannon.
- Cannons speed increased.
- Hud glass changed (clearlier).
- Glitch that players can go on the top of cannons fixed.
- Cannon balls damage and radius damage increased.
- 3 min after the map is voted : the cannons control rooms not hurt more and the doors to go to the other area are oppening.
- Gold blocks can be break with the knife (Only).
- Doors to go to the control cannon room never close.
NADE O'CLOCK
- Speed x2 for the block that control the arrow's speed.
- Chat message displaying when an arrow settings is max.
- Random reverse delay decreased.
- Respawn delay for the blocks decreased to 1 second (3 seconds before).
- Arrows stop rotating when a team won the game.

Special Notes ::

No Radar or HDR, this is done to keep the filesize down plus
also these features are not needed on such a small map.
On spawn all players get weapon stripped and given a knife,
full armour and a single HE grenade, there are more scattered 
around the top and bottom floors, if you fall you die, simple!
there are 16 spawns per side.

in clan |wbc|

This map is simply a HE arena with a jenga tower in the front. the blocks of the jenga tower can be destroyed by grenades or mass knifing it. All blocks are physboxes which make it collapse nice.

The map tested on ukcs before with about 30 players (see screen 3 for the result) and showed that even with the physboxes there was barely lag even though you had pretty much choke (most likely coused by low FPS).

This map supports 64 players but i suggest to use less to prevent heavy lag (also there are only about 55 grenades on the floor).

The sound effects are from GTA2.

Note: I have placed the blocks a little bit apart because the FPS would drop massively if they were all placed to each other and now the tower collapses faster because blocks get damages easier.

24 Slot he maps, when you go throught the main "doors" in 30 seconds time a explosive barrel will spawn from the rotating box in the air.
2 Little "elevators" to get up to upper section of the map ( 1 for each team )
1 Smoke grenade in the middle of the map
----
Have fun

grenade war map where teams spawn on separate sides of a glass wall and throw grenades at each other. There are also 3 grenade spawners in rooms that you can see into but can't see out of. 

Thanks to eric for his his metal texture pack. 

If you upload it to your server or modify it please post here or pm me! I'd love to hear about it.
Your mission is to aim for the holes that are in the invisible wall in the middle! :)

This is just a fun he map, there are two ways you can attack the enemy; by throwing the grenades through the spaces in the glass or by rebounding it off the top grass panel. Have fun, and please comment and rate my map, thanks.

Two teams on either side of a big glass wall (which can be climbed on the edges). The glass wall has 3 holes in it, 2 of which are blocked with glass which must be broken. Theres a secret buyzone, but getting there, hurts, and getting out is even more painful! All the water is acidic, and all the wood is breakable - but BE AWARE: it IS possible to get up onto the wood, and it is possible to climb around, just dont expect textures ;)
